name: wirelessly
description: Wirelessly is a VS Code extension that simplifies connecting and managing Android devices over Wi-Fi using ADB. It allows developers to pair and connect devices wirelessly without needing a USB cable, supporting both pairing code and QR code methods. With features for quick setup, automatic detection, and seamless reconnection, Wirelessly helps streamline the Android development workflow by making wireless debugging faster and more convenient directly from VS Code.

scripts.compile: npm run check-types && npm run lint && node esbuild.js
scripts.package: npm run check-types && npm run lint && node esbuild.js --production
scripts.pretest: npm run compile-tests && npm run compile && npm run lint
